mapper.insert: insert into `employee` (name, sex, no, age, phone_number, department_name) values (#{name}, #{sex}, #{no}, #{age}, #{phoneNumber}, #{departmentName})
mapper.update: update `employee` set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, no = #{no}, age = #{age}, department_name = #{departmentName}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} where id = #{id}
